title: Jessica Rosenberg, DO New York
cleaned_text: Jessica Rosenberg, DO New York [Murray Hill Office](/locations/nyc/murrayhill/)- [212-530-2288](tel:212-530-2288) Education: New York College Sees ages 14+ Doctors of Osteopathic Medicine, or DOs, are fully licensed and board-certified physicians who practice in all areas of medicine. DOs emphasize a whole-person approach to treatment and receive extra training in the musculoskeletal system called osteopathic manipulative treatment (OMT). DOs at One Medical typically practice in the field of family medicine, geriatrics, pediatrics, or internal medicine, and may also integrate OMT. About Jessica A caring and passionate physician, Jessica has a holistic approach focused on mind and body wellness with an emphasis on lifestyle and prevention. She enjoys partnering with her patients to solve the root cause of their problems. She's especially interested in weight loss medicine, which helps patients achieve their health goals through weight loss medications and lifestyle management. She's also enrolled in an integrative medicine fellowship through the University of Arizona and is training to be a yoga therapist. To keep herself healthy, Jessica does yoga, cycling, barre classes, paddleboarding, and kayaking. Committed to giving back, she has run a healthcare program for the homeless and worked overseas doing medical missions in Africa, India, and South America. Jessica earned her doctor of osteopathy degree at the New York College of Osteopathic Medicine before completing her residency at Jamaica Hospital. She's board-certified by the American College of Osteopathic Family Physicians and the American College of Obesity Medicine.
